WindowGetDefaultComputedStyle.summary:
CAUTION Non-standard The getDefaultComputedStyle() method gives the default computed values of all the CSS
properties of an element, ignoring author styling. That is, only user-agent and user
styles are taken into account.
WindowGetDefaultComputedStyle.returns:
The returned style is a CSSStyleDeclaration
object. The object is of the same type as the object returned by
, but only takes into account user-agent and
user rules.
